00108 /* 10/04/02 REK Changing the for loop to a call to memset.  This gives a huge
00109  *              speedup on Itanium. */
00110 int
00111 cuddInitCache(
00112   DdManager * unique /* unique table */,
00113   unsigned int cacheSize /* initial size of the cache */,
00114   unsigned int maxCacheSize /* cache size beyond which no resizing occurs */)
00115 {
00116 #if 0
00117     int i;
00118 #endif
00119     unsigned int logSize;
00120 
00121     logSize = cuddComputeFloorLog2(ddMax(cacheSize,unique->slots/2));
00122     cacheSize = 1 << logSize;
00123     unique->cache = ALLOC(DdCache,cacheSize);
00124     if (unique->cache == NULL) {
00125         unique->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00126         return(0);
00127     }
00128     unique->cacheSlots = cacheSize;
00129     unique->cacheShift = sizeof(int) * 8 - logSize;
00130     unique->minCache = unique->cacheSlots;
00131     unique->maxCacheHard = maxCacheSize;
00132     /* We ignore cacheSize in initializing unique->maxCache because
00133     ** both quantities are monotonic increasing. Hence it is as if
00134     ** we took the maximum of maxCache and cacheSize. */
00135     unique->maxCache = ddMin(maxCacheSize,unique->slots);
00136     Cudd_SetMinHit(unique,DD_MIN_HIT);
00137     /* Initialize to avoid division by 0 and immediate resizing. */
00138     unique->cacheMisses = (double) (int) (cacheSize * unique->minHit + 1);
00139     unique->cacheHits = 0;
00140     unique->memused += cacheSize * sizeof(DdCache);
00141     unique->totCachehits = 0;
00142     /* The sum of cacheMisses and totCacheMisses is always correct,
00143     ** even though cacheMisses is larger than it should for the reasons
00144     ** explained above. */
00145     unique->totCacheMisses = -unique->cacheMisses;
00146     unique->cachecollisions = 0;
00147     unique->cacheinserts = 0;
00148     unique->cachedeletions = 0;
00149 
00150     /* Initialize the cache */
00151     /* 10/04/02 REK Simply call memset instead of initializing the struct
00152      *              manually. */
00153     memset (unique->cache, '\0', cacheSize * sizeof (DdCache));
00154 
00155 #if 0
00156     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < cacheSize; i++) { 
00157       unique->cache[i].data = NULL; 
00158 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00159       unique->cache[i].count = 0; 
00160 #endif
00161     } 
00162 #endif
00163     
00164     return(1);
00165 
00166 } /* end of cuddInitCache */

00180 void
00181 cuddCacheInsert(
00182   DdManager * table,
00183   DdNode * (*op)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *),
00184   DdNode * f,
00185   DdNode * g,
00186   DdNode * h,
00187   DdNode * data)
00188 {
00189     int posn;
00190     register DdCache *entry;
00191 
00192     posn = ddCHash(op,f,g,h,table->cacheShift);
00193     entry = &table->cache[posn];
00194 
00195     if (entry->data != NULL) {
00196         table->cachecollisions++;
00197     }
00198     table->cacheinserts++;
00199 
00200     entry->op = (DdNode *(*)()) op;
00201     entry->f = f;
00202     entry->g = g;
00203     entry->h = h;
00204     entry->data = data;
00205 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00206     entry->count++;
00207 #endif
00208 
00209 } /* end of cuddCacheInsert */

00310 DdNode *
00311 cuddCacheLookup(
00312   DdManager * table,
00313   DdNode * (*op)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *),
00314   DdNode * f,
00315   DdNode * g,
00316   DdNode * h)
00317 {
00318     int posn;
00319     register DdCache *en,*cache;
00320     DdNode *data;
00321 
00322     cache = table->cache;
00323 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00324     if (cache == NULL) {
00325         return(NULL);
00326     }
00327 #endif
00328 
00329     posn = ddCHash(op,f,g,h,table->cacheShift);
00330     en = &cache[posn];
00331     if (en->data != NULL && en->f==f && en->g==g && en->h==h && en->op==(DdNode *(*)())op) {
00332         data = Cudd_Regular(en->data);
00333         table->cacheHits++;
00334         if (data->ref == 0) {
00335             cuddReclaim(table,data);
00336         }
00337         return(en->data);
00338     }
00339 
00340     /* Cache miss: decide whether to resize. */
00341     table->cacheMisses++;
00342 
00343     if (table->cacheSlots < table->maxCache &&
00344         table->cacheHits > table->cacheMisses * table->minHit) {
00345         cuddCacheResize(table);
00346     }
00347 
00348     return(NULL);
00349 
00350 } /* end of cuddCacheLookup */
00351

00624 
00641 DdNode *
00642 cuddConstantLookup(
00643   DdManager * table,
00644   DdNode * (*op)(DdManager *, DdNode *, DdNode *, DdNode *),
00645   DdNode * f,
00646   DdNode * g,
00647   DdNode * h)
00648 {
00649     int posn;
00650     register DdCache *en,*cache;
00651 
00652     cache = table->cache;
00653 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00654     if (cache == NULL) {
00655         return(NULL);
00656     }
00657 #endif
00658     posn = ddCHash(op,f,g,h,table->cacheShift);
00659     en = &cache[posn];
00660 
00661     /* We do not reclaim here because the result should not be
00662      * referenced, but only tested for being a constant.
00663      */
00664     if (en->f == f && en->g == g && en->h == h && en->data != NULL &&
00665     en->op == (DdNode *(*)()) op) {
00666         table->cacheHits++;
00667         return(en->data);
00668     }
00669 
00670     /* Cache miss: decide whether to resize. */
00671     table->cacheMisses++;
00672 
00673     if (table->cacheSlots < table->maxCache &&
00674         table->cacheHits > table->cacheMisses * table->minHit) {
00675         cuddCacheResize(table);
00676     }
00677 
00678     return(NULL);
00679 
00680 } /* end of cuddConstantLookup */

00682 
00695 int
00696 cuddCacheProfile(
00697   DdManager * table,
00698   FILE * fp)
00699 {
00700     DdCache *cache = table->cache;
00701     int slots = table->cacheSlots;
00702     int nzeroes = 0;
00703     int i, retval;
00704 
00705 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00706     double count, mean, meansq, stddev, expected;
00707     long max, min;
00708     int imax, imin;
00709     long *hystogramQ, *hystogramR; /* histograms by quotient and remainder */
00710     int nbins = DD_HYSTO_BINS;
00711     int bin;
00712     long thiscount;
00713     double totalcount;
00714 
00715     meansq = mean = expected = 0.0;
00716     max = min = (long) cache[0].count;
00717     imax = imin = 0;
00718     totalcount = 0.0;
00719 
00720     hystogramQ = ALLOC(long, nbins);
00721     if (hystogramQ == NULL) {
00722         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00723         return(0);
00724     }
00725     hystogramR = ALLOC(long, nbins);
00726     if (hystogramR == NULL) {
00727         FREE(hystogramQ);
00728         table->errorCode = CUDD_MEMORY_OUT;
00729         return(0);
00730     }
00731     for (i = 0; i < nbins; i++) {
00732         hystogramQ[i] = 0;
00733         hystogramR[i] = 0;
00734     }
00735 
00736     for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
00737         thiscount = (long) cache[i].count;
00738         if (thiscount > max) {
00739             max = thiscount;
00740             imax = i;
00741         }
00742         if (thiscount < min) {
00743             min = thiscount;
00744             imin = i;
00745         }
00746         if (thiscount == 0) {
00747             nzeroes++;
00748         }
00749         count = (double) thiscount;
00750         mean += count;
00751         meansq += count * count;
00752         totalcount += count;
00753         expected += count * (double) i;
00754         bin = (i * nbins) / slots;
00755         hystogramQ[bin] += thiscount;
00756         bin = i % nbins;
00757         hystogramR[bin] += thiscount;
00758     }
00759     mean /= (double) slots;
00760     meansq /= (double) slots;
00761     stddev = sqrt(meansq - mean*mean);
00762 
00763     retval = fprintf(fp,"Cache stats: slots = %d average = %g ", slots, mean);
00764     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00765     retval = fprintf(fp,"standard deviation = %g\n", stddev);
00766     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00767     retval = fprintf(fp,"Cache max accesses = %ld for slot %d\n", max, imax);
00768     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00769     retval = fprintf(fp,"Cache min accesses = %ld for slot %d\n", min, imin);
00770     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00771     retval = fprintf(fp,"Cache used slots = %.2f%%\n",
00772                      100.0 - (double) nzeroes * 100.0 / (double) slots);
00773     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00774 
00775     if (totalcount > 0) {
00776         expected /= totalcount;
00777         retval = fprintf(fp,"Cache access hystogram for %d bins", nbins);
00778         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00779         retval = fprintf(fp," (expected bin value = %g)\nBy quotient:",
00780                          expected);
00781         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00782         for (i = nbins - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00783             retval = fprintf(fp," %ld", hystogramQ[i]);
00784             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00785         }
00786         retval = fprintf(fp,"\nBy residue: ");
00787         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00788         for (i = nbins - 1; i>=0; i--) {
00789             retval = fprintf(fp," %ld", hystogramR[i]);
00790             if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00791         }
00792         retval = fprintf(fp,"\n");
00793         if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00794     }
00795 
00796     FREE(hystogramQ);
00797     FREE(hystogramR);
00798 #else
00799     for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
00800         nzeroes += cache[i].data == NULL;
00801     }
00802     retval = fprintf(fp,"Cache used slots = %.2f%%\n",
00803                      100.0 - (double) nzeroes * 100.0 / (double) slots);
00804     if (retval == EOF) return(0);
00805 #endif
00806     return(1);
00807 
00808 } /* end of cuddCacheProfile */
00809 
00810 
00822 void
00823 cuddCacheResize(
00824   DdManager * table)
00825 {
00826     DdCache *cache, *oldcache, *entry, *old;
00827     int i;
00828     int posn, shift;
00829     unsigned int slots, oldslots;
00830     double offset;
00831     extern void (*MMoutOfMemory)(long);
00832     void (*saveHandler)(long);
00833 
00834     oldcache = table->cache;
00835     oldslots = table->cacheSlots;
00836     slots = table->cacheSlots = oldslots << 1;
00837 
00838 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00839     (void) fprintf(stderr,"Resizing the cache from %d to %d entries\n",
00840                 oldslots, slots);
00841     (void) fprintf(stderr,"\thits = %g\tmisses = %g\thit ratio = %5.3f\n",
00842                 table->cacheHits, table->cacheMisses,
00843                 table->cacheHits / (table->cacheHits + table->cacheMisses));
00844 #endif
00845 
00846     saveHandler = MMoutOfMemory;
00847     MMoutOfMemory = Cudd_OutOfMem;
00848     table->cache = cache = ALLOC(DdCache,slots);
00849     MMoutOfMemory = saveHandler;
00850     /* If we fail to allocate the new table we just give up. */
00851     if (cache == NULL) {
00852 #ifdef DD_VERBOSE
00853         (void) fprintf(stderr,"Resizing failed. Giving up.\n");
00854 #endif
00855         table->cacheSlots = oldslots;
00856         table->cache = oldcache;
00857         /* Do not try to resize again. */
00858         table->maxCacheHard = table->maxCache = oldslots - 1;
00859         return;
00860     }
00861     shift = --(table->cacheShift);
00862     table->memused += (slots - oldslots) * sizeof(DdCache);
00863 
00864     /* Clear new cache. */
00865     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < slots; i++) {
00866         cache[i].data = NULL;
00867 #ifdef DD_CACHE_PROFILE
00868         cache[i].count = 0;
00869 #endif
00870     }
00871 
00872     /* Copy from old cache to new one. */
00873     for (i = 0; (unsigned) i < oldslots; i++) {
00874         old = &oldcache[i];
00875         if (old->data != NULL) {
00876             if (old->g == old->h) { /* probably 2-operand operation */
00877                 posn = ddCHash2(old->op,old->f,old->g,shift);
00878             } else {
00879                 posn = ddCHash(old->op,old->f,old->g,old->h,shift);
00880             }
00881             entry = &cache[posn];
00882             entry->op = old->op;
00883             entry->f = old->f;
00884             entry->g = old->g;
00885             entry->h = old->h;
00886             entry->data = old->data;    
00887         }
00888     }
00889 
00890     FREE(oldcache);
00891 
00892     /* Reinitialize measurements so as to avoid division by 0 and
00893     ** immediate resizing.
00894     */
00895     offset = (double) (int) (slots * table->minHit + 1);
00896     table->totCacheMisses += table->cacheMisses - offset;
00897     table->cacheMisses = offset;
00898     table->totCachehits += table->cacheHits;
00899     table->cacheHits = 0;
00900 
00901 } /* end of cuddCacheResize */
00902 
00903 
00915 void
00916 cuddCacheFlush(
00917   DdManager * table)
00918 {
00919     int i, slots;
00920     DdCache *cache;
00921 
00922     slots = table->cacheSlots;
00923     cache = table->cache;
00924     for (i = 0; i < slots; i++) {
00925         table->cachedeletions += cache[i].data != NULL;
00926         cache[i].data = NULL;
00927     }
00928 
00929     return;
00930 
00931 } /* end of cuddCacheFlush */
00932 
00933 
00946 int
00947 cuddComputeFloorLog2(
00948   unsigned int value)
00949 {
00950     int floorLog = 0;
00951 #ifdef DD_DEBUG
00952     assert(value > 0);
00953 #endif
00954     while (value > 1) {
00955         floorLog++;
00956         value >>= 1;
00957     }
00958     return(floorLog);
00959 
00960 } /* end of cuddComputeFloorLog2 */
